description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Guide to Stanton Drew and its ancient Stones ... With notes on the church and old houses, and records relating to Pensford, by the Rev. H. T. Perfect ... With map and illustrations" Author: Dymond, Charles William. Contributor: PERFECT, Henry Theodore. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010352.f.45." Page: 44 Place of Publishing: Bristol Date of Publishing: 1896 Publisher: J. Wright & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001023028 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
